nav.div: Orchard Farm School District » District » COVID-19

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;
color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: OFSD Families,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: With the closing of school facilities for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, we wanted to provide an update on programs, services, and events happening in our District. Please take a moment to review the important areas listed below.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; height: 21px; width: 21px; border: none; font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Access to the Buildings

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: A drive-up plan has been developed for students/parents to retrieve items left in lockers/classrooms. We will be letting students/parents on the campuses alphabetically starting on

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: . District staff will be gathering the items and have them ready for pick up. PreK-5 and Middle School students/parents will drive up to the designated pick up point for your building anytime between 8 am-4 pm on your day. Staff will then take your name and retrieve your items and bring them directly to your vehicle

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-style: italic; font-family: Arial;

p.span: (please do not exit your vehicle).

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: PreK and Elementary families will need student and teacher names. Middle School families will need to know the student’s locker number. Feel free to write your information on paper and place it in your window. Any High School student that had items left in their locker will be notified by the school.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;

p.span: This is also the time to drop off any library books/ athletic uniforms you may have to staff.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: High School uniforms and library books can be dropped off at the HS Performance Center between 10-2 on your designated alphabetical day.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Please place athletic uniforms in a sealed trash bag with your name on it.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;

p.span: See the maps below for directional instructions.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Monday 4/27

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700;

p.span: (A-G)

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Tuesday 4/28

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700;

p.span: (H-P)

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Wednesday 4/29

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700;

p.span: (Q-Z)

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);

p.span: Access to Meals (Continues until May 20th)

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Student breakfast and lunch packs will

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;

p.span: CONTINUE

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: to be made available during the duration of the closure.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Pick up locations and times are as follows:

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: circle;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Discovery Elementary school (11:00am-12:00pm)

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: circle;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: St. Francis Church in Portage Des Sioux - parking lot (10:00am-11:00am)

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: circle;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: If you are unable to pick up meals due to illness or lack of transportation, delivery options are available

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: On Mondays, we provide 2 days worth of breakfast and lunch. On Wednesdays, we provide 3 days worth of breakfast and lunch.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Our Chartwells Food Service staff will continue to handle all of the food prep and Orchard Farm staff will handle distribution.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: *If you have already completed the survey there is nothing you need to do. Your meals will continue. For anyone in need of this service, please complete the survey below. In order to have an accurate meal count, if you signed up for Access to Meals and are not picking up your meals, please email

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: to be removed from the list.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-family: Arial;

p.span: For Access to Meals

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: , click this link:

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);

p.span: School Events

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Based on the recommendation from the St. Charles County Department of Public Health and i

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: n order to maintain a focus on the safety of our students and staff, we have decided to cancel all upcoming events and Youth Camps for the summer of 2020. This includes Prom and enrichment and athletic camps. District leadership is still going over different options for Graduation and will have that information soon. Camp refunds will be processed as soon as possible and will be applied directly to the credit card used for registration. Specific information relating to summer contact days for high school programs will be released at a later date.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; height: 25px; width: 25px; border: none; font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Access to Learning Opportunities (Continues until May 20th)

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Starting next week (April 20th), we will move to a 4 day learning week. Our staff will continue to work and connect with students five days a week. However, no “new” instructional material will be presented/given out on Fridays. We hope this new weekly schedule will give staff and students more allotted time to master essential learning skills and give everyone some much needed time to breathe a little bit more. Fridays will be set aside for students to work on assignments, students to receive extra/additional help from teachers, staff to connect with students, and/or staff to engage in professional development. See below.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;

p.span: PreK and Grades K-5

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: (Email to parents and posted on Seesaw)

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Elementary teachers will continue to prepare a menu of learning activities for students to engage and learn. Teachers will maintain correspondence with parents through email and Seesaw. Students and parents should send emails to teachers if they have questions. If you require a printed copy, they will be available for pick up at the Early Learning Center lobby at 3489 Boschertown Rd. Copies are also available at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: West Alton City Hall, Warner's Auto Shop (Portage), Orchard Farm Baptist Church little library, New Town Christian Church little library, Elm Point office/little library and Deerfield little library.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Students are encouraged to complete activities and submit their work for feedback, if possible.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Students will be promoted to the next grade level. Students will not receive a letter grade on their report card. Standards will not be reported on for the 4th quarter.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Grades 6-12

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: (Email to parents and students, and posted in the student’s Google Classroom)

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Secondary teachers have created learning activities for students to continue to practice and support essential learning skills. Teachers will maintain correspondence with students through email and Google classroom. Students and parents should send emails to teachers if they have questions. Teachers will provide home activities, online resources that students can use at home (usernames and passwords included) to enhance learning, and to offer other learning services. Students enrolled in LAUNCH virtual courses, Edgenuity, AP courses, and College Credit courses will continue their virtual learning as normal. Completion of this work is highly encouraged to ensure students remain on track for their learning goals.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;

p.span: MIDDLE SCHOOL

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Students will continue to engage in learning activities/assignments provided by their teachers. Teachers will provide feedback to students on their work.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Students will PASS each class provided they meet the minimum criteria set forth by administration/teacher. Students not on track to meet those minimum criteria will work with the school counselor and administration. Understanding of the unique and unprecedented circumstances students may be in will take precedence in those situations.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Students will NOT take a final exam.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;

p.span: HIGH SCHOOL

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Students will continue to engage in learning activities/assignments provided by their teachers and posted on Classroom. Teachers will provide feedback to students on their work.

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Each teacher has posted Menu Options in Classroom. Core Courses have 4 Menu Options and Elective Courses have 2 menu Options.

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: The 1st Menu Options (non-college credit and AP courses) needs to be submitted back to the teacher by April 24th. This first Menu Option will lock in the student's 3rd quarter grade for that course and will also raise the grade accordingly. All other Menu Options submitted have the opportunity to raise the student's grade.

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: AP and College credit courses will continue with posted assignments from the teacher.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Verdana; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Students not on track to meet those minimum criteria will work with school counselors and administration. Understanding of the unique and unprecedented circumstances students may be in will take precedence in those situations.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Students will receive a letter grade on their report card.

li.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt;

p.span: Students will NOT take a final exam.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);

background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Assistance with Technology Access?

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: We are continuing to survey grades 6-12 families about technology access, please fill it out if you have not already. While K-5 students’ assignments/activities can be completed independent of technology access, we have also created a technology access survey for that age group. Please take a moment to fill out the K-5 survey if you have not already.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Should you need technology support, please contact the District Help Desk at 636-757-6895 or email

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Grade K-5 Technology survey

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: , click this link:

background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Future Updates

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: We will continue to follow the guidance of health and government officials as we make decisions. We will share information and resources through our School Messenger parent notification system as well as our district website, eNews and social media channels. We are grateful for your continued patience and understanding as we work through this unprecedented time. Please take care of yourself and your family, and thank you for joining together to support each other and our students.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 107, 55);
